description: Italian men have a reputation for being cocky and Luigi surelives up to it in every sence of the word! Even during his interview, he had a hard time keeping his hands of his crotch.Then again, if you had nine prime thick inches of Grade A pepperoni, you would have a difficult time resisting that urge to take that bad boy out and give it the room it needs.Luigi has a classic Roman face, a tight body and being watched seemed to really send his juices into hyperdrive. He worked himself into a frenzy right on the carpeting and when he finally let that load explode out of those balls, he propelled a huge batch of jism right into hyperspace. Viva Roma!
title: Nine Oh-Cock, Scene #02
